title: 20 min leavebuster I accepted, someone dodged and I still have 20 min timer?
body: It's my last leavebuster timer, I clicked accept, someone else declined and It reset my timer WTF?

replies.body:
I also got a 5 minute queue ban for someone else dodging, yesterday.

Something is fucked up.
I literally waited 20 min, clicked accept, was returned to queue and had to restart a 20 min timer. rito dgaf though.
